episode.title: DevSpeak #24 | How to become a development leader?
episode.members: Diego Fernandes, João Paulo and Cleiton Souza
episode.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three tech professionals to discuss everything that goes on in the programming orbit.

DevSpeak is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about a variety of topics that matter to your dev career. In this episode, Diego Fernandes joins Cleiton Souza and João Paulo de Magalhães to discuss leadership, considering professional, technical and even emotional aspects, what does being a dev leader involve? After all, what is a development leader?

Audio in Brazilian Portuguese.
